            <string language="hu">Egységvektor, helyvektor</string>
            <string language="en">uniform vector and local vector</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">konstanter Vektor und lokaler Vektor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vecteur uniforme et vecteur local</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vetor uniforme e vetor local</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vettore dell'uniforme e vettore locale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ομοιόμορφο διανυσματικό και τοπικό διάνυσμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">vector uniforme y vector local</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Egységvektorok a koodináta-rendszerben, helyvektor felbontása.</string>
            <string language="en">uniform vector in the co-ordinate system, disintegration of local vectors</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">11. osztály,  kép,  helyvektor,  </string>
            <string language="en">11. class,   picture,    local vector</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">konstanter Vektor im Koordinierung System, 
Zerfall der lokalen Vektoren</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vecteur uniforme dans le système de coordination,
désintégration des vecteurs locaux</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vetor uniforme no sistema de coordenação, 
disintegration de vetores locais</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vettore nel sistema di coordinazione, 
disintegrazione dell'uniforme dei vettori locali</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ομοιόμορφο διάνυσμα στο ισότιμο σύστημα, αποσύνθεση 
των τοπικών διανυσμάτων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">vector uniforme en el sistema de coordinar, 
desintegración de vectores locales</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">11. Kategorie, Abbildung, lokaler Vektor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">11. classe, image, vecteur local</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">11. clase, cuadro, vector local</string>
